attributes.action: Give Nurses the Payrise They Deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Among the most overworked yet underpaid public sector professionals there are. Police are paid way more than nurses for doing less (and much less training) and so are all other professions. It is about time they got the pay they deserve. It is an insult the way they are treated by this Government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
